feed.title: Ghost Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.89.3
entry.content:
• 🐛 Fixed a bug causing new drafts to only save if the title is populated (#20769) - Chris Raible

View the changelog for full details: https://github.com/tryghost/ghost/compare/v5.89.2...v5.89.3

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.89.4
entry.content:
• 🐛 Fixed editor unsaved changes modal showing too often (#20787) - Kevin Ansfield
  • 🐛 Fixed autosave not triggering when in-editor excerpt is changed (#20785) - Kevin Ansfield

View the changelog for full details: https://github.com/tryghost/ghost/compare/v5.89.3...v5.89.4

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.89.5
entry.content:
• 🔒 Added UUID verification to member endpoints not requiring a session (see advisory) - Steve Larson

View the changelog for full details: https://github.com/tryghost/ghost/compare/v5.89.4...v5.89.5

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.89.6
entry.content:
• 🐛 Fixed editor performance issues in Safari for posts with HTML or Markdown cards (#20806) - Ronald Langeveld

View the changelog for full details: https://github.com/tryghost/ghost/compare/v5.89.5...v5.89.6

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.90.0
entry.content:
• 🔒 Fixed admin forms defaulting to GET method (#20810) - Chris Raible
  • ✨ Improved email analytics jobs system (#20809) - Steve Larson
  • ✨ Updated email analytics job to prioritize open events (#20800) - Steve Larson
  • 🎨 Improved the performance of the /members/events/ aggregated_click_event endpoint (#20790) - Princi Vershwal
  • 🐛 Fixed shift selection in the posts list (#20818) - Steve Larson
  • 🐛 Fixed fetching labels and offers in the editor (#20815) - Steve Larson
  • 🐛 Fixed frontend routing prioritizing collections over built in routes (#20765) - Chris Raible

View the changelog for full details: https://github.com/tryghost/ghost/compare/v5.89.6...v5.90.0
